definition: to limit/to confine/to restrict sth within set boundaries
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Project-based ecosystem services accounting has its limitations, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而作为项目基础的生态系统服务会计有其局限性。

sentences.english: The localization of the definition of significant figures in the current teaching materials is verified with example analyses.
sentences.chinese: 以实例分析了现行教材中有效数字定义的局限性。

sentences.english: In short, maternal instinct is wonderful, but it has its limits.
sentences.chinese: 总之，母性本能是美好的，但它有其局限性。

sentences.english: Finally, it confuses the ambit of historical determinism and historical non-determinism.
sentences.chinese: 其四，混淆机械决定论和辩证决定论的局限。

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他们的角色远远不局限于乱七八糟的玩耍，专家说。

sentences.english: Tensions are not confined to North-East Asia.
sentences.chinese: 紧张状态并不局限在东北亚地区。

sentences.english: The appeal of geological traces is limited as a tourism resource.
sentences.chinese: 地质遗迹作为旅游资源，其吸引力有一定的局限性。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the models were restricted to open-type linkages.
sentences.chinese: 起初，这个模型是局限于开式连接。

sentences.english: They just have their limitations. Consider these three problems with RDBMSs
inherent limitations of one-factor authentication mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 单因素认证机制固有的局限性。

sentences.english: Volunteer work does not have to focus only on helping the poor and disadvantaged.
sentences.chinese: 志愿工作并非仅仅局限在帮助贫困的弱势群体上。

sentences.english: However, this limitation can be overcome by manually inserting the annotations.
sentences.chinese: 但是，通过手动添加注释能够克服这种局限性。

sentences.english: However, both Chinese nation spirits and Chinese contemporary literature have transitionary limitations.
sentences.chinese: 近代中华民族精神和中国近代文学都有过渡性的局限。

sentences.english: B2B is the core business modus of Launcher, but not limit this.
sentences.chinese: B2B是当前朗趣的核心商业形式，但不局限于此。

sentences.english: His cognitive way contains not only rationalities but also limitations.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔都塞的认识方法有合理性也有局限性。

definition: to be limited to/to be confined to
to jump out/fig. to appear suddenly
